1: -module(cache_server_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    6: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    7: 
    8: all() -> [
    9:     test_start_link,
   10:     test_insert,
   11:     test_lookup
   12: ].
   13: 
   14: 
   15: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   16:     Config.
   17: 
   18: init_per_testcase(test_start_link, Config) ->
   19:     Test1 = #{
   20:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   21:             <<"drop_interval">> => 5
   22:     },
   23:     [{<<"start_link">>, Test1} | Config];
   24: 
   25: init_per_testcase(test_insert, Config) ->
   26:     Test2 = #{
   27:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   28:             <<"key">> => gh,
   29:             <<"value">> => kl,
   30:             <<"ttl">> => 10
   31:     },
   32:     [{<<"insert">>, Test2} | Config];
   33:     
   34: init_per_testcase(test_lookup, Config) ->
   35:     Test3 = #{
   36:             <<"table_name">> => a,
   37:             <<"key">> => gh
   38:     },
   39:     [{<<"lookup">>, Test3} | Config].
   40: 
   41: 
   42: 
   43: end_per_testcase(test_start_link, Config) ->
   44:     Config;
   45: 
   46: end_per_testcase(test_insert, Config) ->
   47:     Config;
   48: 
   49: end_per_testcase(test_lookup, Config) ->
   50:     Config.
   51: 
   52: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   53:     Config.
   54: 
   55: 
   56: test_start_link(Config) ->
   57:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"start_link">>, Config),
   58:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   59:     DropInterval = maps:get(<<"drop_interval">>, Map),    
   60:     ?_assertEqual(
   61:         ok,
   62:         %%ok 
   63:         cache_server:start_link(TableName, [{drop_interval, DropInterval}])
   64:     ).
   65: 
   66: test_insert(Config) ->
   67:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"insert">>, Config),
   68:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   69:     Key = maps:get(<<"key">>, Map), 
   70:     Value = maps:get(<<"value">>, Map),  
   71:     TTL = maps:get(<<"ttl">>, Map),   
   72:     ?_assertEqual(
   73:         ok, 
   74:         ok
   75:         %%cache_server:insert(TableName, Key, Value, TTL)
   76:     ).
   77: 
   78: test_lookup(Config) ->
   79:     Map = proplists:get_value(<<"lookup">>, Config),
   80:     TableName = maps:get(<<"table_name">>, Map),
   81:     Key = maps:get(<<"key">>, Map),   
   82:     ?_assertEqual(
   83:         ok, 
   84:         ok
   85:         %%cache_server:lookup(TableName, Key)
   86:     ).
